work.name: Universidad Autónoma de Querétaro
work.summary: As a student, I associated with SNI(Sistema Nacional de Investigadores) members to develop an algorithm to be implemented on a mobile device for surface reconstruction. Following the requirements imposed by CONACyT(COnsejo NAcional de Ciencia y Tecnología) through their PNPC(Programa Nacional de Posgrados de Calidad) program

publications.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
publications.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.
